RelatedSentence: The Institute of Documentary Film is looking for creative documentary projects from Central and Eastern Europe to participate in the  Ex Oriente Film  2014 training programme .
The Institute of Documentary Film is looking for creative documentary projects from Central and Eastern Europe to participate in the  Ex Oriente Film  2014 training programme .
Each year IDF selects up to 14 projects that receive assistance from a wide range of film experts , with each workshop focusing on a different segment of development .
